org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms.softmodem
Class CSoftwareDeviceInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms.softmodem.CSoftwareDeviceInfo

public class CSoftwareDeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains some information about the GSM modem/phone as well as some simple statistics (total inbound/outbound messages).

Nested Class Summary
static class CSoftwareDeviceInfo.CSoftwareStatistics
          Statistics' class (total inbound/outbound messages).
